item.description:
Approximate cost: $14-$16/person. Depends on final wines and number of attendees.
Please bring $5 bills and $1 bills.

Theme: California Appellations and the unique Zinfandel
AWS Conference Highlights
Education: Discuss Zinfandel origins and history
Side by Side comparisons of at least 6 Zins
Appetizers
Mystery wines
Exchange Dollars for Wine
Discuss Decembers meeting
Drawing - Two Free Wine Expo Trade tickets for Sunday, Jan 25
(Must attend Nov meeting)
AWS Meetup Group
item.name: AWS November Chapter Meeting
